attributes.action: Put a maximum figure of £25 to be charged for EFL tickets.
attributes.additional_details:
Highest EFL ticket price:

£45- Leeds United

When you add these costs along with the excessive food costs and transfer costs a huge sum of money is spent just to attend a game which should be something everybody can enjoy without worrying about money Sign this petition to make it illegal to charge more than £25 for a ticket at football games.
attributes.background: Currently, in the football league fans are having to pay thousands of pounds a year just to support the football club they love. n league one there are tickets on sale for up to £25 and in the championship, the highest ticket price is at £45.
